audio

Interface AudioSource


  • public interface AudioSource
    Interface of sound or music source in 3 dimentional space.

    Can be used to set sounds in the game engine depending on position of the source.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    homelleon
    See Also:
    AudioSourceBuffered

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void continuePlaying()
      Method to start sound to play from moment it was paused using method pause().
      void delete()
      Method to delete audio source from audio buffer of AudioMaster.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Method to return name of audio source stored in audio buffer of AuidoMaster.
      boolean isPlaying()
      Method that check AudioSource if it is playing at that moment.
      void pause()
      Method to stop sound to play.
      void play()
      Method to start sound source to play.
      void setLooping(boolean loop)
      Method that defines if sound will be repeating after it was played till the end.
      void setPitch(float pitch) 
      void setPosition(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position) 
      void setVelocity(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f speed)
      Represents 3 dimentional speed of sound and sets how fast the sound will change in all 3 directions.
      void setVolume(float volume) 
      void stop()
      Method to stop sound to play.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Method to return name of audio source stored in audio buffer of AuidoMaster.
        Returns:
        String name
        See Also:
        AuidoMaster, AudioMasterBuffered

      • play

        void play()
        Method to start sound source to play.

        Whatever sound was paused by method pause() it is still start playing from begining because method play() uses two other methods: stop() and continuePlaying().

        See Also:
        pause(), stop(), continuePlaying()

      • delete

        void delete()
        Method to delete audio source from audio buffer of AudioMaster.
        See Also:
        AudioMaster, AudioMasterBuffered

      • pause

        void pause()
        Method to stop sound to play.

        By this method Auidio Source remember the moment before stop and it can be continued after using method continuePlaying().

        See Also:
        stop(), continuePlaying(), play()

      • continuePlaying

        void continuePlaying()
        Method to start sound to play from moment it was paused using method pause().

      • stop

        void stop()
        Method to stop sound to play.
        Unlike pause() method stop() don't make Audio Source to remember moment the sound stopped playing. That's why use of method continuePlaying() make sound play from begining.
        See Also:
        pause(), play(), continuePlaying()

      • setVelocity

        void setVelocity(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f speed)
        Represents 3 dimentional speed of sound and sets how fast the sound will change in all 3 directions.
        Parameters:
        speed - Vector3f - 3 dimentional speed value
        See Also:
        setPosition(Vector3f)

      • setLooping

        void setLooping(boolean loop)
        Method that defines if sound will be repeating after it was played till the end.
        Parameters:
        loop - boolean - defines if it repeats

      • isPlaying

        boolean isPlaying()
        Method that check AudioSource if it is playing at that moment.
        Returns:
        true if it is playing
        false if it is stopped
        See Also:
        play(), continuePlaying(), stop(), pause()

      • setVolume

        void setVolume(float volume)

      • setPitch

        void setPitch(float pitch)

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position)
